resources.string:
To start communication: 
 

		1) Click on Connect. 
 		2) Choose HM-10 Module from the list. 
 		3) Choose HM-10 Service from the second list. 
 
 		Buttons: 
 

		Set: Sends the value you chose from the command drop down list + the value in the empty field and sets it.

 		Query: Sends the value you chose from the command drop down list + a question mark, returns the value you chose.

 		Test: Sends AT to the device.
